section.title: Introduction to the Tutorial
section.para: The tour shows off the types of pages in the &PRODUCTABBR; dashboard along with their customization points. The tutorial portions step through uploading a sample configuration and making adjustments to it to see how changes appear in the dashboard.

For the tour and tutorial, you will need a developer account and a hosted &PRODUCTABBR; Sandbox environment. To set this up for the first time, follow the instructions in Overview and First Steps for inBloom Application Development in the &PRODUCTABBR; developer documentation. This includes:

listitem.para: Accessing the "Admin" page for the sandbox
Loading sample data to view in the dashboard application
